languages.text: "Возможно, сейчас вид мой не внушает вам ужас, однако когда-нибудь это изменится. Ген {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} нестабилен — со временем мое тело будет меняться. И как именно — ведомо, быть может, лишь {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Богу-Императору{/g}..." {n}Кассия с неподдельным испугом прижимает пальцы к губам, словно запоздало останавливая вырвавшиеся слова.{/n}

"Perhaps my appearance does not terrify you right now, but this will not always be so. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene is unstable — my body is going to change over time. And only the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} knows exactly how..." {n}In genuine terror, Cassia presses fingers to her lips, as if belatedly trying to stop the words from tumbling out.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Возможно, сейчас вид мой не внушает вам ужас, однако когда-нибудь это изменится. Ген {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} нестабилен — со временем мое тело будет меняться. И как именно — ведомо, быть может, лишь {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Богу-Императору{/g}..." {n}Кассия с неподдельным испугом прижимает пальцы к губам, словно запоздало останавливая вырвавшиеся слова.{/n}

And only the God-Emperor knows exactly how..." {n}Cassia presses fingers to her lips in obvious fear, as if trying to hold back the escaped words.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “或许我的外表现在还没有令你感到恐惧，但现状不会一直维持下去。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的基因并不稳定，我的身体会随着时间的推移而改变。恐怕只有{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}才知道我究竟会变成什么样子……”{n}卡西娅的语气中带着真正的恐惧。她用手指按住了嘴唇，仿佛在努力阻止后面的话脱口而出。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my appearance does not terrify you right now, but this will not always be so. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene is unstable — my body is going to change over time. And only the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} knows exactly how..." {n}In genuine terror, Cassia presses fingers to her lips, as if belatedly trying to stop the words from tumbling out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “或许我的外表现在还没有令你感到恐惧，但现状不会一直维持下去。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的基因并不稳定，我的身体会随着时间的推移而改变。恐怕只有{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}才知道我究竟会变成什么样子……”{n}卡西娅的语气中带着真正的恐惧。她用手指按住了嘴唇，仿佛在努力阻止后面的话脱口而出。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Perhaps my appearance does not terrify you right now, but this will not always be so. The Navigator gene is unstable — my body is going to change over time. And only the God-Emperor knows exactly how..." {n}In genuine terror, Cassia presses fingers to her lips, as if belatedly trying to stop the words from tumbling out.{/n}

languages.text: «Tal vez mi apariencia no le aterre ahora mismo, pero eso cambiará. El gen de los {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegantes{/g} es inestable y mi cuerpo se alterará con el tiempo. Solo el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g} sabe cómo acabará...». {n}Cassia, sinceramente espantada, se lleva la mano a la boca como si quisiera intentar evitar decir lo que ha dicho.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my appearance does not terrify you right now, but this will not always be so. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene is unstable — my body is going to change over time. And only the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} knows exactly how..." {n}In genuine terror, Cassia presses fingers to her lips, as if belatedly trying to stop the words from tumbling out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez mi apariencia no le aterre ahora mismo, pero eso cambiará. El gen de los {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegantes{/g} es inestable y mi cuerpo se alterará con el tiempo. Solo el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g} sabe cómo acabará...». {n}Cassia, sinceramente espantada, se lleva la mano a la boca como si quisiera intentar evitar decir lo que ha dicho.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「今は私の姿に恐怖を感じないかもしれませんが、ずっとそうとは限りません。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の遺伝子は不安定で…私の身体は時間とともに変化していくのです。そして、どうなるかを知っているのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}だけなのです…」{n}恐怖のあまり、カシアは唇を指で押さえ、言葉がこぼれ落ちるのを止めようとした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my appearance does not terrify you right now, but this will not always be so. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene is unstable — my body is going to change over time. And only the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} knows exactly how..." {n}In genuine terror, Cassia presses fingers to her lips, as if belatedly trying to stop the words from tumbling out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「今は私の姿に恐怖を感じないかもしれませんが、ずっとそうとは限りません。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の遺伝子は不安定で…私の身体は時間とともに変化していくのです。そして、どうなるかを知っているのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}だけなのです…」{n}恐怖のあまり、カシアは唇を指で押さえ、言葉がこぼれ落ちるのを止めようとした。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Im Moment mag mein Aussehen Euch keine Angst machen, doch das wird nicht immer so sein. Das {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}-Gen ist instabil — mein Körper wird sich im Lauf der Zeit verändern. Und nur der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperator{/g} weiß, wie genau ..." {n}Cassia presst sich aufrichtig entsetzt die Finger auf die Lippen, als würde sie zu spät versuchen, die Worte am Herauspurzeln zu hindern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my appearance does not terrify you right now, but this will not always be so. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene is unstable — my body is going to change over time. And only the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} knows exactly how..." {n}In genuine terror, Cassia presses fingers to her lips, as if belatedly trying to stop the words from tumbling out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Im Moment mag mein Aussehen Euch keine Angst machen, doch das wird nicht immer so sein. Das {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}-Gen ist instabil — mein Körper wird sich im Lauf der Zeit verändern. Und nur der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperator{/g} weiß, wie genau ..." {n}Cassia presst sich aufrichtig entsetzt die Finger auf die Lippen, als würde sie zu spät versuchen, die Worte am Herauspurzeln zu hindern.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Mon apparence ne vous terrifie peut-être pas encore, mais ça viendra. Le gène du {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} est instable, ce qui veut dire que mon corps va continuer à se métamorphoser, et l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} seul sait comment... » {n}Sincèrement ébranlée, Cassia presse ses doigts contre ses lèvres comme pour empêcher les mots de continuer à sortir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my appearance does not terrify you right now, but this will not always be so. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene is unstable — my body is going to change over time. And only the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} knows exactly how..." {n}In genuine terror, Cassia presses fingers to her lips, as if belatedly trying to stop the words from tumbling out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mon apparence ne vous terrifie peut-être pas encore, mais ça viendra. Le gène du {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} est instable, ce qui veut dire que mon corps va continuer à se métamorphoser, et l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} seul sait comment... » {n}Sincèrement ébranlée, Cassia presse ses doigts contre ses lèvres comme pour empêcher les mots de continuer à sortir.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Belki şu an beni görünce dehşete düşmüyorsundur ama illaki düşersin. {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} geni dengesizdir. Vücudum zaman içinde değişime uğrayacak. Bunun tam olarak nasıl vuku bulacağını da sadece {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g} bilir." {n}Cassia, ağzından çıkan sözcüklere engel olmakta geç kalmışçasına, sahici bir dehşetle parmaklarını dudaklarına bastırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my appearance does not terrify you right now, but this will not always be so. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene is unstable — my body is going to change over time. And only the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} knows exactly how..." {n}In genuine terror, Cassia presses fingers to her lips, as if belatedly trying to stop the words from tumbling out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Belki şu an beni görünce dehşete düşmüyorsundur ama daima öyle olmayacak. {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} geni dengesizdir... Vücudum zaman içinde değişikliğe uğrayacak. Tam olarak nasıl değişeceğini sadece {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g} biliyor..." {n}Cassia, ağzından çıkan sözcüklere engel olmakta geç kalmışçasına ve gerçekten dehşete düşmüş bir şekilde parmaklarını dudaklarına bastırıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
